amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the section 8 voucher program for housing assistance by $344 million and decrease funding for the international space station accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for Section 8 housing by $344 million for 60,000 new Section 8 vouchers. The amendment would transfer the same amount from the $2.1 billion allotted for the International Space Station.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 286 (Roll no. 307).
